text:
Storefront | New York, NY | ONSITE | Senior Full Stack Engineer and Senior UI/UX Designer

Storefront is actively building our Product & Engineering teams and is looking for a talented senior full-stack software engineer (backend focus) to work onsite in New York City or REMOTE within the US (Eastern time hours). Our tech stack includes Ruby on Rails (Ruby 2.x and Rails 4.x), Node, Angular, Elixir, Postgres, ElasticSearch, and Heroku (soon AWS). Salary is very competitive.

We are also looking for a strong UI/UX designer to work onsite in our New York office alongside our VP of Product.

https://boards.greenhouse.io/storefront
